Title: Vikings
Actors: Travis Fimmel, Katheryn Winnick, Alexander Ludwig, Clive Standen, Gustaf Skarsgard, Alyssa Sutherland, Linus Roache, Thorbj√∏rn Harr, Donal Logue, George Blagden, Jessalyn Gilsig, Gabriel Byrne
Plot: The adventures of Ragnar Lothbrok: the greatest hero of his age. The series tells the saga of Ragnar's band of Viking brothers and his family as he rises to become King of the Viking tribes. As well as being a fearless warrior, Ragnar embodies the Norse traditions of devotion to the gods: legend has it that he was a direct descendant of Odin, the god of war and warriors.
